ch0116_40_hikari/0101_0701_02_10: I’m sure something good will happen to you today!
ch0116_40_hikari/7101_0701_01_10:
What do you think of this new outfit? The apron is
like strawberry mousse, right? I think it’s stylish
and cute!
ch0116_40_hikari/7101_0701_02_10:
And these pins in my hair! Don’t they look like 
Strawberry Sweets? How yummy!
ch0116_40_hikari/7101_0701_03_10: It’s as if Alcremie decided to decorate me!
ch0116_40_hikari/7102_0701_01_10:
My Alcremie always has this sweet scent
around her...
ch0116_40_hikari/7102_0701_02_10:
That must be why I always feel so happy just
being by her side!
ch0116_40_hikari/7103_0701_01_10:
Wearing this outfit really puts me in the mood to
bake something!
ch0116_40_hikari/7103_0701_02_10:
But then again...I sometimes forget about the oven
and end up with cakes that are burnt to a crisp...
ch0116_40_hikari/7103_0701_03_10: Even mistakes like that make baking fun!
ch0116_40_hikari/7104_0701_01_10:
When you’re giving someone a gift, it’s good
to choose carefully what to give them, but how 
you wrap it is important, too!
ch0116_40_hikari/7104_0701_02_10:
When gift wrapping is stylish, the person receiving
the gift might enjoy it even more! When I see that,
I can’t help but feel happier, too!
ch0116_40_hikari/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? What kind of 
things do you like?
ch0116_40_hikari/7105_0701_02_10:
Since I became a Trainer before you, I’d like to 
learn more about you! That’s why I’m asking.
ch0116_40_hikari/7105_0701_03_10: If you tell me, I’ll give you a present!
ch0116_40_hikari/1701_0701_01_10:
Found you! So this is where you were hanging 
out, huh?
ch0116_40_hikari/1701_0701_02_10: Here, this is for you! It’s a present!
ch0116_40_hikari/1701_0702_01_10: I put a lot of heart into it! Use it wisely!
ch0116_40_hikari/2501_0701_01_10:
I think it’s pretty embarrassing to put your feelings
into words.
ch0116_40_hikari/2501_0701_02_10:
Sometimes, I feel like I really need to say
something but still don’t have the courage to
actually say it...
ch0116_40_hikari/2501_0701_03_10:
That’s why I always choose carefully when I’m
getting a present for someone!
ch0116_40_hikari/2501_0702_01_10:
When you give a present, it’s full of all
your feelings!
ch0116_40_hikari/2501_0702_02_10: I think that’s why presents can be so special.
ch0116_40_hikari/2511_0701_01_10:
How sweet is just sweet enough? And do they like
milk chocolate or dark chocolate?
ch0116_40_hikari/2511_0701_02_10:
Oh, whoops! How long have you been
standing there?
ch0116_40_hikari/2511_0701_03_10: Anyway, this might be perfect timing!
ch0116_40_hikari/2511_0702_01_10:
Would you come shopping with me?
Looks like I might need to buy more stuff than I
originally thought.
ch0116_40_hikari/2511_0702_02_10:
I’m sure we can manage it! It’s just a little more,
after all!
ch0116_40_hikari/2511_0702_03_10: I’ll also let you have some of the sweets we make!
ch0116_40_hikari/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! You look like you’re ready to go on
an adventure! Want some sweets to take with you
in case you get hungry?
ch0116_40_hikari/3003_0701_01_10:
Hi! I was just thinking about what kind of snacks
I want to make...and now I’m super hungry!
ch0116_40_hikari/3005_0701_01_10:
You’re up late tonight! After a long day, I like to
treat myself to some sweets!
